titles.title: Fairness for Rural Teaching Hospitals Act of 2023
Fairness for Rural Teaching Hospitals Act of 2023
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to update the calculation of the hospital specific rate for such hospitals, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Fairness for Rural Teaching Hospitals Act of 2023
This bill modifies the payment methodology for the Medicare-Dependent Hospital program, which provides additional payments to certain small rural hospitals that have a high proportion of Medicare patients.
Specifically, the bill excludes indirect medical costs from initial payment calculations and instead requires an additional, separate payment for such costs.
